name: cyberShard
description:
you woke up and remembered who you had to save

----

WASD - Move

Arrows - Adjust Camera

SPACE - Attack

SHIFT - Dash

M - Pause

----

MADE FOR THE STRAIGHTUPGRUNTLED GAME JAM 2021

DOWN TO THE WIRE:

1) become clear at the last moment

2) literal wires

-----

My first non-casual finished game, and my first full game in UE4!  

-----

At the last moment of the jam, I fixed doors and nerfed boss.

v1 - could not get to main boss. woke up at 5am in a startle and fixed immediately.

v2 - doors are glitchy

v3 - doors are no longer glitchy. there's a bit of a boss glitch though.
